trans-unit.source: This class provides writable access to certain attributes so that users can modify read-only properties of the "dummy" principal object that is passed to a <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher" /> object when using [Query By Example](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/84ac40bb-04c4-4d0b-adaf-0ddb9253599e).
trans-unit.target: 這個類別會提供特定屬性的寫入權限，讓使用者可以修改「虛擬」主體物件的唯讀屬性，該物件會在使用[依例查詢](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/84ac40bb-04c4-4d0b-adaf-0ddb9253599e)時傳遞至 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.AdvancedFilters> class is accessed from a <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.UserPrincipal> object through the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.UserPrincipal.AdvancedSearchFilter%2A> property, and is effectually treated like a property of the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.UserPrincipal> object, and isn't intended to be used on its own.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.AdvancedFilters>類別從存取<xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.UserPrincipal>物件透過<xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.UserPrincipal.AdvancedSearchFilter%2A>屬性，並有效地視為屬性<xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.UserPrincipal>物件，並且不想要在本身使用。

trans-unit.source: See the [Query By Example](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/84ac40bb-04c4-4d0b-adaf-0ddb9253599e) topic for example code.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱[查詢 By Example](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/84ac40bb-04c4-4d0b-adaf-0ddb9253599e)主題，例如程式碼。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.Principal" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.Principal" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Instantiates a new <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.AdvancedFilters" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 具現化新的 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.AdvancedFilters" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Not intended to be called directly.
trans-unit.target: 不適合直接呼叫。

trans-unit.source: Applications should access <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.AdvancedFilters> through the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.UserPrincipal.AdvancedSearchFilter%2A> property of the user object.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式應該存取<xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.AdvancedFilters>透過<xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.UserPrincipal.AdvancedSearchFilter%2A>使用者物件的屬性。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.MatchType" /> that specifies how <c>expirationTime</c> should be used in the comparison.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.MatchType" />，指定應該如何在比較中使用 <c>expirationTime</c>。

trans-unit.source: Sets the query filter for the <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.AuthenticablePrincipal.AccountExpirationDate" /> attribute to the specified time and comparison type.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.AuthenticablePrincipal.AccountExpirationDate" /> 屬性的查詢篩選條件設定為指定的時間和比較類型。

trans-unit.source: The time will default to UTC.
trans-unit.target: 時間會預設為 UTC。

trans-unit.source: If you want to specify the time in local time, then specify the <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> property of your <xref:System.DateTime> object as <xref:System.DateTimeKind.Local?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要以本地時間中指定的時間，然後指定<xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>屬性您<xref:System.DateTime>物件當做<xref:System.DateTimeKind.Local?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.MatchType" /> that specifies how <c>lockoutTime</c> should be used in the comparison.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.MatchType" />，指定應該如何在比較中使用 <c>lockoutTime</c>。

trans-unit.source: Sets the <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.AuthenticablePrincipal.AccountLockoutTime" /> query filter to the specified time and comparison type.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.AuthenticablePrincipal.AccountLockoutTime" /> 查詢篩選條件設定為指定的時間和比較類型。

trans-unit.source: The time will default to UTC.
trans-unit.target: 時間會預設為 UTC。

trans-unit.source: If you want to specify the time in local time, then specify the <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> property of your <xref:System.DateTime> object as <xref:System.DateTimeKind.Local?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要以本地時間中指定的時間，然後指定<xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>屬性您<xref:System.DateTime>物件當做<xref:System.DateTimeKind.Local?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The name of the attribute
trans-unit.target: 屬性的名稱

trans-unit.source: An object.
trans-unit.target: 物件。

trans-unit.source: The object type of <c>value</c>.
trans-unit.target: <c>value</c> 的物件類型。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.MatchType" /> that specifies how <c>value</c> should be compared to the attribute's value.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.MatchType" />，指定應該如何將 <c>value</c> 與屬性的值進行比較。

trans-unit.source: Creates a query filter for a property in an extended class.
trans-unit.target: 在擴充類別中建立屬性的查詢篩選器。

trans-unit.source: In an extended class, you might implement an advanced search filter for `LogonCount`:
trans-unit.target: 在擴充的類別中，您可能會實作進階的搜尋篩選條件`LogonCount`:

trans-unit.source: An integer.
trans-unit.target: 整數。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.MatchType" /> that specifies how <c>badLogonCount</c> should be compared to the attribute's value.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.MatchType" />，指定應該如何將 <c>badLogonCount</c> 與屬性的值進行比較。

trans-unit.source: Sets the query filter for the <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.AuthenticablePrincipal.BadLogonCount" /> attribute to the specified value and comparison type.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.AuthenticablePrincipal.BadLogonCount" /> 屬性的查詢篩選條件設定為指定的值和比較類型。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.MatchType" /> that specifies how <c>lastAttempt</c> should be used in the comparison.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.MatchType" />，指定應該如何在比較中使用 <c>lastAttempt</c>。

trans-unit.source: Sets the query filter for the <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.AuthenticablePrincipal.LastBadPasswordAttempt" /> attribute to the specified <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> and the specified comparison value.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.AuthenticablePrincipal.LastBadPasswordAttempt" /> 屬性的查詢篩選條件設定為指定的 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> 和指定的比較值。

trans-unit.source: The time will default to UTC.
trans-unit.target: 時間會預設為 UTC。

trans-unit.source: If you want to specify the time in local time, then specify the <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> property of your <xref:System.DateTime> object as <xref:System.DateTimeKind.Local?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要以本地時間中指定的時間，然後指定<xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>屬性您<xref:System.DateTime>物件當做<xref:System.DateTimeKind.Local?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.MatchType" /> that specifies how <c>logonTime</c> should be used in the comparison.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.MatchType" />，指定應該如何在比較中使用 <c>logonTime</c>。

trans-unit.source: Sets the query filter for the <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.AuthenticablePrincipal.LastLogon" /> attribute to the specified <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> and the specified comparison value.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.AuthenticablePrincipal.LastLogon" /> 屬性的查詢篩選條件設定為指定的 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> 和指定的比較值。

trans-unit.source: The time will default to UTC.
trans-unit.target: 時間會預設為 UTC。

trans-unit.source: If you want to specify the time in local time, then specify the <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> property of your <xref:System.DateTime> object as <xref:System.DateTimeKind.Local?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要以本地時間中指定的時間，然後指定<xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>屬性您<xref:System.DateTime>物件當做<xref:System.DateTimeKind.Local?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.MatchType" /> that specifies how <c>passwordSetTime</c> should be used in the comparison.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.MatchType" />，指定應該如何在比較中使用 <c>passwordSetTime</c>。

trans-unit.source: Sets the query filter for the <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.AuthenticablePrincipal.LastPasswordSet" /> attribute to the specified <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> and the specified comparison value.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.AuthenticablePrincipal.LastPasswordSet" /> 屬性的查詢篩選條件設定為指定的 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> 和指定的比較值。

trans-unit.source: The time will default to UTC.
trans-unit.target: 時間會預設為 UTC。

trans-unit.source: If you want to specify the time in local time, then specify the <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> property of your <xref:System.DateTime> object as <xref:System.DateTimeKind.Local?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要以本地時間中指定的時間，然後指定<xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>屬性您<xref:System.DateTime>物件當做<xref:System.DateTimeKind.Local?displayProperty=nameWithType>。
